import React from 'react'; // COMPONENTS import { Parallax, ParallaxLayer } from 'react-spring/renderprops-addons'; // IMAGES import City1 from '../Images/City1.JPG' import City2 from '../Images/City2.jpg' import City3 from '../Images/City3.jpg' import Music1 from '../Images/Music1.jpg' import Music2 from '../Images/Music2.jpeg' // CSS import '../css/Interests.css' export default class Interests extends React.Component { state = { page: '' } top = ( music , home ) => { home.scrollTo(1) music.scrollTo(0) setTimeout( () => home.scrollTo(3) , 1500 ) } bottom = ( music , home ) => { home.scrollTo(2) music.scrollTo(2) setTimeout( () => home.scrollTo(3) , 1000 ) } render() { return (
{/*

Interests

*/} {/*
  • Sci-fi
  • Garageband / music making
  • Photography
  • Reading
*/}

this.Parallax.scrollTo(0)}>Photography

this.Parallax.scrollTo(2)}>Music

( this.Parallax = ref ) } pages={3} horizontal = {true} style = {{ 'height': '90vh' , 'width': '100%' }}>
{/* PHOTOGRAPHY PARALLAX */}
( this.PhotoParallax = ref ) } pages={1.5} speed ={.1} style = {{ 'height': '70vh' , 'width': '100%' }}>

Photography is one of my favorite ways to feel free. I love taking pictures of the city.

Photography
{/* MUSIC PARALLAX */}
(this.MusicParallax = ref)} pages={2} horizontal = {false} style = {{ 'height': '90vh' , 'width': '100%' }}>
this.top( this.MusicParallax , this.Parallax )} className = 'Image'/>

Photography is one of my favorite ways to feel free. I love taking pictures of the city.

Music

) } }
